title: Can you play Oculus Quest while it's charging? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. It’ll even continue to charge whilst you play games. Obviously doing this invalidates one of the system's benefits, untethered movement and you have to pay attention to the wire that is there “now” but simply switching from Roomscale largely sidesteps these issues. It should be noted that depending on your cable and your PC’s USB it may not charge when using Oculus Link to play PC VR
